Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

: : Rodimus Prime : :

Rodimus sounds rather agitated when he answers the commlink.

Rodimus Prime(via comm): I'm in my office. You can speak with me here, Rattrap.


lordofdarkness11001 <lordofdarkness11001@...> wrote:
Rattrap (over comm): " rodimus i need to speak to you."
--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimsu winces at the sounds of his beloved being tortured. And he 
hears her Predacon designation, Blackstorm. He despised it. They had 
violated Nightlight, his wife, in a way never thought possible, her 
very identity.
> 
> As the comm channel closes, the screen switches to black and then 
shows the Maximal insignia.
> 
> Rodimus slumps back into his chair.
> 
> He had to get Nightlight back. Mostly for his daughter. Elita 
needed her mother.
> 
> 
> Jeff <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> :: Hydras ::
> 
> A cruel grin creeped across Hydras face as he listened intently to 
> the audio synth that Maxima had made. He clenched his right fist 
> with eagerness; he wanted to do it again. 
> 
> "Rodimus, know this: Nigh--" He stops cracking another evilish 
> grin, "Blackstorm is of no consequence. Whether she lives or dies 
> matters not. Your eminent destruction comes, preparing for it will 
> only further your suffering. Hydras out." As he closes the comm 
> line, a deep laugh rumbles from Hydras.
> 
> "Well done Maxima." He places his hand on her shoulder. "Now we 
must 
> plan to use Blackstorm to lure Rodimus out so we can destroy him."
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> > Maximadid as was asked, without question or looking at Hydras. 
> > 
> > Touching a few buttons, then within a second was Nightlight's 
> voice & some 
> > torturing moments. Not screams much, but some slight noticing 
> moments of pain... 
> > as well as the moment she was reprogrammed into Blackstorm... & 
> Perceptor's 
> > little informative reprogramming of who she was. & her 
> acknowledgement of she 
> > being Blackstorm & no longer Nightlight. There was no mention.. 
of 
> Nightlight. 
> > Just... Blackstorm. 
> > 
> > Her crimson optics glanced up to Rodimus & a wicked smirk cracked 
> her face. 
> > Oh, she was enjoying this. The more torture for him, the better.
> 
> 
> Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
> Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of 
Service. 
> 
>
